verses.verse: Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, when <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [of it,] that he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4068>Madon<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8110>Shimron<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H407>Achshaph,<s%>

and to the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were of the <S%H6828>north<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country,<s%> and in the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> – <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinneroth<s%> and in the <S%H8219>lowland<s%> and on the <S%H9338>heights<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> –

to the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%> and on the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> at the <S%H8478>foot<s%> of <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4709>Mizpeh.<s%>

And they <S%H3318>came<s%> out, they and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4264>armies<s%> with them, [as] <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> [as] the <S%H2344>sand<s%> that is on the <S%H3220>seashore,<s%> <S%H8193><s%> with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots.<s%>

So <S%H3605>all<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> having <S%H3259>agreed<s%> to <S%H3259>meet,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H9191>together<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4792>Merom,<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> "Do not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of them, for <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> you shall <S%H9432>hamstring<s%> their <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H4818>chariots<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>"

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> with him <S%H935>came<s%> upon them <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4792>Merom,<s%> and <S%H5307>attacked<s%> them.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> so that they <S%H5221>defeated<s%> them, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> them as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H7227>Great<s%> <S%H6721>Sidon<s%> and Misrephoth-maim and the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%> to the <S%H4217>east;<s%> and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> them <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H8300>survivor<s%> was <S%H7604>left<s%> to them.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to them as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H559>told<s%> him; he <S%H9432>hamstrung<s%> their <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> their <S%H4818>chariots<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> and <S%H3920>captured<s%> <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> its <S%H4428>king<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> for <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> <S%H6440>formerly<s%> was the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms.<s%>

And they <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was in it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroying<s%> [them;] there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> one <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H5397>who<s%> <S%H5397>breathed.<s%> And he <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3920>captured<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and he <S%H5221>struck<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> [and] <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them; <S%H9201>just<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

<S%H7534>However,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did not <S%H8313>burn<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> on their <S%H8510>mounds,<s%> <S%H2108>except<s%> <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> <S%H905>alone,<s%> [which] <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H8313>burned.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> and the <S%H929>cattle,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H962>took<s%> as their <S%H962>plunder;<s%> but they <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they had <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them. They <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H5397>who<s%> <S%H5397>breathed.<s%>

<S%H9201>Just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did;<s%> he <S%H5493>left<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H5493>undone<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Thus <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H776>land:<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5045>Negev,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and its <S%H8219>lowland<s%>

from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2510>Halak,<s%> that <S%H5927>rises<s%> toward <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> even as <S%H5704>far<s%> as Baal-gad in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> at the <S%H8478>foot<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon.<s%> And he <S%H3920>captured<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> them <S%H5221>down<s%> and <S%H4191>put<s%> them to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>waged<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4428>kings.<s%>

There was not a <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H7999>made<s%> <S%H7999>peace<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1115>except<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%> <S%H3427>living<s%> in <S%H1391>Gibeon;<s%> they <S%H3947>took<s%> them <S%H3605>all<s%> in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

For it was of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H2388>harden<s%> their <S%H3820>hearts,<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that he might <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroy<s%> them, that they might <S%H1961>receive<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H8467>mercy,<s%> but that he might <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them, <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H6062>Anakim<s%> from the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country,<s%> from <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> from <S%H1688>Debir,<s%> from <S%H6024>Anab<s%> and from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them with their <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

There were <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6062>Anakim<s%> <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> in <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> in <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> and in <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> some <S%H7604>remained.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H4256>divisions<s%> by their <S%H7626>tribes.<s%> Thus the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8252>had<s%> <S%H8252>rest<s%> from <S%H4421>war.<s%>
